snippet: Disused church buildings should be used to house refugees, who must be embraced rather than feared, Pope Francis told asylum seekers in Rome on Tuesday.
abstract: Pope Francis announces, during address to asylum seekers in Rome, that disused church buildings should be used to house refugees; practice has attracted some criticism.
lead_paragraph: Disused church buildings should be used to house refugees, who must be embraced rather than feared, Pope Francis told asylum seekers in Rome on Tuesday.

headline.main: Vatican: Use Church Buildings to House Refugees, Pope Says
headline.print_headline: Vatican: Use Church Buildings To House Refugees, Pope Says
